medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with a 2-day history of crampy, achy pain associated with nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea, which progressed to bright red blood in the diarrhea. Patient experienced chills and had a temperature of 99.8 at home. No similar pain in the past.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of asthma, adrenal insufficiency, thoracic outlet syndrome, bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome, mitral valve prolapse (MVP), costochondritis, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), and seasonal allergies.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of lung cancer. Mother still alive and is healthy.
